passages.text:
Your grandfather was found dead. Suicide.

[[intro 2]]
passages.name: intro 1

passages.text:
He was found hooked to his computer, with a bullet in the head and a gun in his hand.


[[intro 3]]
passages.name: intro 2

passages.text:
You were very close. He was a computer engineer. He taught you everything.

[[intro 4]]
passages.name: intro 3

passages.text:
Months later, his possesssions have been released. You manage to get your hands on the drive your grandpa was probably working with when he died. 

You try to understand: why did he kill himself?
passages.name: intro 4
